critique: The document describes the transfer of land from the Department of Agriculture to the Department of Commerce for use as a fish hatchery. It appears to be an executive order from 1938. There is little to no information available about the ideological tilt, immigration approach, security vs. liberty, economic regulation, or social inclusion. The document does show an expansion of executive power as it is an executive order transferring land. It also shows a strong federal control as the land is being transferred between federal departments.
